name: test_faithfulness[get_data3]
description: Validates that the model response remains faithful to the reference context for loyalty tier offers.

parameters.name: get_data
parameters.value: {'user_input': 'How are tier benefits applied when two passengers have different frequent flyer tiers?', 'reference_contexts': ['When two passengers traveling together have different frequent flyer tiers, each passenger typically receives benefits according to their individual tier level. For example, a Gold member receives Gold-tier perks, while a Silver member receives Silver-tier benefits. However, for shared benefits such as lounge access, some airlines may allow a higher-tier passenger to extend access to a companion depending on their policy.'], 'reference': 'When passengers have different frequent flyer tiers, each passenger generally receives benefits according to their own tier level. Some shared benefits, like lounge access, may depend on airline policy.', 'synthesizer_name': 'single_hop_specific_query_synthesizer'}
